Lao Delegation Arrives
   Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the National Assembly of the Lao People's Democratic Republic led by Thongsing Thammavong, president of the National Assembly who is member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, arrived here today at the invitation of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.
